mainText:
I never had the privilege of meeting him, but he has touched my heart.  
He was an innovator and true inspiration to new generation inventors, 
believers, CEOs, and anyone else following their dreams.  There will 
never be another man like him, but I hope that thousands will try their 
best to become even a fraction of what Steve Jobs was.  My heartfelt 
condolences go to his family and to the people he worked with.
author: Tanja
